renderpass.code:
#define C -= smoothstep(R-R, 3./R, .3 - max(abs(U.x+ .3+min(t,.6-t)), \
                                             abs(U+ .3-t) ) ).y, \
             U = vec2(-U.y,U)                             //
void mainImage(out vec4 O, vec2 u) {
    vec2 R = iResolution.xy,
         t = R-R + .3*mod(iTime,2.),
         U = (u+u - R) / R.y *mat2(cos(vec4(0,33,11,0) -iTime ));
         O++; O C; O C; O C; O C; }                             /*






// --- 228 chars

#define C -= smoothstep(0., 3./R.y, .3 - max(abs(U.x+ .3+min(t,.6-t)), \
                                             abs(U.y+ .3-t) ) ), \
             U = vec2(-U.y,U)                             //
#define mainImage( O, u )                                  \
    float t = .3* mod(iTime,2.);                           \
    vec2  R = iResolution.xy,                              \
          U = (u+u - R) / R.y *mat2(cos(vec4(0,33,11,0) -iTime )); \
     O++; O C; O C; O C; O C                              /*
              
              
              
              
              
      
// --- 240 chars  ( rotation : +33 )

#define C(U) smoothstep(2./R.y, 0.,max(abs(U.x+ .3+.3*min(t,2.-t)),\
                                       abs(U.y+ .3-.3*t) ) - .3 ) //
#define mainImage( O, u )                                  \
    float t = mod(iTime,2.);                               \
    vec2  R = iResolution.xy,                              \
          U = (u+u - R) / R.y *mat2(cos(vec4(0,33,11,0) -iTime )), \
          V = vec2(-U.y,U);                                \
    O += 1.- C(-U) - C(U) - C(-V) - C(V)                  /*
              
              
              
              
              

// --- 234 chars

#define C(U) smoothstep(2./R.y, 0.,  abs(max(U.x,U.y)) - .3 )
#define mainImage( O, u )                                  \
    float t = mod(iTime,2.);                               \
    vec2  R = iResolution.xy,                              \
          U = (u+u - R)/R.y, V = vec2(-U.y,U.x),           \
          D = .3+.3*vec2( min( t, 2.-t ), -t );            \
    O += 1.- C(abs(U-D)) - C(abs(U+D)) - C(abs(V-D)) - C(abs(V+D)) /*
/**/
renderpass.name: Image
